languages.text: Но все мое внимание было поглощено Идирой Тласс. Вцепляясь в плечи очередного астропата и пристально глядя ему в глаза, она заставляла буйствующих псайкеров захлебнуться утробным воем и скорчиться на полу, не помышляя о сопротивлении. Скольких она спасла? Сколько погибло бы, не будь ее?

traits.locale_text: Но все мое внимание было поглощено Идирой Тласс. Вцепляясь в плечи очередного астропата и пристально глядя ему в глаза, она заставляла буйствующих псайкеров захлебнуться утробным воем и скорчиться на полу, не помышляя о сопротивлении. Скольких она спасла? Сколько погибло бы, не будь ее?

languages.text: But my attention was wholly captured by Idira Tlass. Gripping the shoulders of each Astropath in turn and staring into their eyes, she compelled the raving psykers to collapse with a visceral cry, curling up on the deck with all thought of resistance gone from their mind. How many did she save? How many would have perished without her?
languages.original_text: Но все мое внимание было поглощено Идирой Тласс. Вцепляясь в плечи очередного астропата и пристально глядя ему в глаза, она заставляла буйствующих псайкеров захлебнуться утробным воем и скорчиться на полу, не помышляя о сопротивлении. Скольких она спасла? Сколько погибло бы, не будь ее?

traits.locale_text: But my attention was wholly captured by Idira Tlass. Gripping the shoulders of each astropath in turn and staring into their eyes, she compelled the raving psykers to collapse with a visceral cry, curling up on the deck with all thought of resistance gone from their mind. How many did she save? How many would have perished without her?

But my attention was wholly captured by Idira Tlass. Gripping the shoulders of each astropath in turn and staring into their eyes, she compelled the raving psykers to collapse with a visceral cry, curling up on the deck with all thought of resistance gone from their mind. How many did she save? How many would have perished without her?

But my attention was wholly captured by Idira Tlass. Gripping the shoulders of each astropath in turn and staring into their eyes, she compelled the raving psykers to collapse with a visceral cry, curling up on the deck with all thought of resistance gone from their mind. How many did she save? How many would have perished without her?

But my attention was wholly captured by Idira Tlass. Gripping the shoulders of each Astropath in turn and staring into their eyes, she compelled the raving psykers to collapse with a visceral cry, curling up on the deck with all thought of resistance gone from their mind. How many did she save? How many would have perished without her?

languages.text: Mi atención estaba cautivada por Idira Tlass, que agarró de uno en uno a los astrópatas y, mirándolos a los ojos, obligó a los psíquicos dementes a desplomarse con un grito visceral, acurrucándose en la cubierta sin oponer resistencia alguna. ¿A cuántos logró salvar? ¿Cuántos habrían muerto de no ser por ella?
languages.original_text: But my attention was wholly captured by Idira Tlass. Gripping the shoulders of each Astropath in turn and staring into their eyes, she compelled the raving psykers to collapse with a visceral cry, curling up on the deck with all thought of resistance gone from their mind. How many did she save? How many would have perished without her?

traits.locale_text: Mi atención estaba cautivada por Idira Tlass, que agarró de uno en uno a los astrópatas y, mirándolos a los ojos, obligó a los psíquicos dementes a desplomarse con un grito visceral, acurrucándose en la cubierta sin oponer resistencia alguna. ¿A cuántos logró salvar? ¿Cuántos habrían muerto de no ser por ella?

languages.text: 但我的注意力完全被伊迪拉·特拉斯吸引了。她一个接一个地抓住那些星语者的肩膀，凝视着他们的眼睛。那些发了疯的灵能者发出凄厉的尖叫，蜷缩在甲板上，脑中所有造反的想法都彻底消失。她拯救了多少人的性命？如果没有她，会有多少人丧生？
languages.original_text: But my attention was wholly captured by Idira Tlass. Gripping the shoulders of each Astropath in turn and staring into their eyes, she compelled the raving psykers to collapse with a visceral cry, curling up on the deck with all thought of resistance gone from their mind. How many did she save? How many would have perished without her?

traits.locale_text: 但我的注意力完全被伊迪拉·特拉斯吸引了。她一个接一个地抓住那些星语者的肩膀，凝视着他们的眼睛。那些发了疯的灵能者发出凄厉的尖叫，蜷缩在甲板上，脑中所有造反的想法都彻底消失。她拯救了多少人的性命？如果没有她，会有多少人丧生？

languages.text: しかし、私はイディラ・トラスから目が離せなかった。彼女は順番に感応通信官達の肩を掴み、その目を見つめ、狂乱する異能者達を体の底から出した叫び声を上げさせる。床に倒れた者達は抵抗の意思は完全に失われていた。彼女は、どれほどの人間を救ってくれただろうか？彼女がいなければ、どれくらいの人間が命を落としていただろう？
languages.original_text: But my attention was wholly captured by Idira Tlass. Gripping the shoulders of each Astropath in turn and staring into their eyes, she compelled the raving psykers to collapse with a visceral cry, curling up on the deck with all thought of resistance gone from their mind. How many did she save? How many would have perished without her?

traits.locale_text: しかし、私はイディラ・トラスから目が離せなかった。彼女は順番に感応通信官達の肩を掴み、その目を見つめ、狂乱する異能者達を体の底から出した叫び声を上げさせる。床に倒れた者達は抵抗の意思は完全に失われていた。彼女は、どれほどの人間を救ってくれただろうか？彼女がいなければ、どれくらいの人間が命を落としていただろう？

languages.text: Aber meine Aufmerksamkeit war ganz und gar von Idira Tlass gefesselt. Sie packte einen Astropathen nach dem anderen an den Schultern und starrte ihnen in die Augen. Mit einem markerschütternden Schrei brachte sie die rasenden Psioniker dazu, zusammenzubrechen und sich auf dem Deck zusammenzurollen, ohne auch nur einen Gedanken an Widerstand zu verschwenden. Wie viele hat sie gerettet? Wie viele wären ohne sie umgekommen?
languages.original_text: But my attention was wholly captured by Idira Tlass. Gripping the shoulders of each Astropath in turn and staring into their eyes, she compelled the raving psykers to collapse with a visceral cry, curling up on the deck with all thought of resistance gone from their mind. How many did she save? How many would have perished without her?

languages.text: Mais c'est Idira Tlass qui a réellement captivé mon attention. Saisissant à tour de rôle les épaules des astropathes et les fixant du regard, elle a poussé les psykers déments à s'effondrer dans un cri et à se recroqueviller sur le sol, toute velléité de résistance envolée de leur esprit. Combien en a-t-elle sauvé ? Combien auraient péri sans elle ?
languages.original_text: But my attention was wholly captured by Idira Tlass. Gripping the shoulders of each Astropath in turn and staring into their eyes, she compelled the raving psykers to collapse with a visceral cry, curling up on the deck with all thought of resistance gone from their mind. How many did she save? How many would have perished without her?

traits.locale_text: Mais c'est Idira Tlass qui a réellement captivé mon attention. Saisissant à tour de rôle les épaules des astropathes et les fixant du regard, elle a poussé les psykers déments à s'effondrer dans un cri et à se recroqueviller sur le sol, toute velléité de résistance envolée de leur esprit. Combien en a-t-elle sauvé ? Combien auraient péri sans elle ?

languages.text: Ama asıl dikkatimi cezbeden İdira Tlass'tı. Sırayla bütün Astropatların omuzlarını kavrıyor, gözlerinin içine bakıyor, çıldırmakta olan ruhsezerleri içgüdüsel bir çığlıkla yere devrilmeye ve direnme düşüncelerinden kurtularak güvertenin üzerinde kıvranmaya zorluyordu. Kaç tanesini kurtardı? O olmasaydı kaç tanesi yitip gidecekti?
languages.original_text: But my attention was wholly captured by Idira Tlass. Gripping the shoulders of each Astropath in turn and staring into their eyes, she compelled the raving psykers to collapse with a visceral cry, curling up on the deck with all thought of resistance gone from their mind. How many did she save? How many would have perished without her?

traits.locale_text: Dikkatim tamamen İdira Tlass'ın üzerindeydi. Sırayla bütün Astropatların omuzlarını kavrıyor ve gözlerinin içine bakıyor, çıldırmakta olan ruhsezerleri ilkel bir çığlıkla yere devrilmeye ve direniş düşüncelerinden kurtularak güvertenin üzerinde kıvranmaya zorluyordu. Kaç tanesi onun sayesinde kurtuldu? O olmasaydı kaç tanesi göçecekti?
